title: Pro completes onboarding without resume or position selection
preconditions: Ensure 'new_onboarding_flow' feature is enabled and the app is freshly installed.

steps.step_text: Launch the Pro app and tap "Create account"
Enter first name, last name, and a valid phone number (leave email blank) then tap "Next"
steps.step_expected: SMS verification code screen is displayed

steps.step_text: Enter the valid verification code received via SMS and tap "Next"
steps.step_expected: If first install, OS push-notification permission prompt appears
User proceeds to the profile photo screen

steps.step_text: Add a profile photo on the "Add your profile photo" screen
Enter a valid birthdate (18+ years old) and tap "Next"
Enter a valid home location and tap "Next"
Without selecting any advanced positions, tap "Next"

steps.step_expected: "Review and save profile" screen appears with pre-filled name & location only

steps.step_text: Scroll to the bottom and tap "Save profile"
Scroll to the bottom of the agreement and tap "I agree and accept"
steps.step_expected: Congrats screen appears with "Book your first shift" CTA and green toast
Open Shifts screen appears; account status is active and six entry-level positions are auto-approved
